item.title: NBC Taps NFL Kickoff to Spotlight New NBA Rights
item.description: NBC hopes to score a marketing touchdown as it launches the first weekend of “Sunday Night Football.” Yet NBC’s goal isn’t necessarily to call attention to the NFL, which start
